languages.text: "Твои угрозы смешны, мон-кай. Думаешь, после всех Путей, по которым мне посчастливилось пройти в этой жизни, я испугаюсь слов столь никчемного существа?"

traits.locale_text: "Твои угрозы смешны, мон-кай. Думаешь, после всех Путей, по которым мне посчастливилось пройти в этой жизни, я испугаюсь слов столь никчемного существа?"

languages.text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"
languages.original_text: "Твои угрозы смешны, мон-кай. Думаешь, после всех Путей, по которым мне посчастливилось пройти в этой жизни, я испугаюсь слов столь никчемного существа?"

traits.locale_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"
"Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"
"Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"
"Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"
"Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

languages.text: «Me río de tus amenazas, mon-keigh. Después de todas las sendas que he tenido la buena fortuna de recorrer en mi vida, ¿te crees que voy a dejarme intimidar por las palabras de una criatura tan insignificante como tú?».
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: «Me río de tus amenazas, mon-keigh. Después de todas las sendas que he tenido la buena fortuna de recorrer en mi vida, ¿te crees que voy a dejarme intimidar por las palabras de una criatura tan insignificante como tú?».

languages.text: 「下らない脅しだな、モン＝ケイ。これまでの人生で数々の幸運な道を歩んできた私が、取るに足らぬ化け物の言葉に屈するとでも思ったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: 「下らない脅しだな、モン＝ケイ。これまでの人生で数々の幸運な道を歩んできた私が、取るに足らぬ化け物の言葉に屈するとでも思ったのか？」

languages.text: “你的威胁空洞无物，猴子。我这辈子有幸走过了那么多道途，如此不值一提的生物说出的话，你真的以为会吓到我吗？”
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: “你的威胁空洞无物，猴子。我这辈子有幸走过了那么多道途，如此不值一提的生物说出的话，你真的以为会吓到我吗？”

languages.text: « Vos menaces sont risibles, mon-keigh. Pensiez-vous vraiment qu'avec toutes les Voies qu'il m'a été donné de suivre dans ma vie, je me laisserais intimider par les mots d'une créature aussi insignifiante ? »
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos menaces sont risibles, mon-keigh. Pensiez-vous vraiment qu'avec toutes les Voies qu'il m'a été donné de suivre dans ma vie, je me laisserais intimider par les mots d'une créature aussi insignifiante ? »

languages.text: "Eure Drohungen sind lächerlich, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nach den ganzen Pfaden, die ich in diesem Leben beschreiten durfte, glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass ich mich von den Worten einer so wertlosen Kreatur wie Euch einschüchtern lasse?"
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Drohungen sind lächerlich, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nach den ganzen Pfaden, die ich in diesem Leben beschreiten durfte, glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass ich mich von den Worten einer so wertlosen Kreatur wie Euch einschüchtern lasse?"

languages.text: "Tehditlerin gülünesi bir hâlde mon-keigh. Hayatım boyunca yürüme şansına eriştiğim tüm o Yollardan sonra bu denli değersiz bir yaratığın sözleriyle gözümün korkacağını mı sandın?"
languages.original_text: "Your threats are laughable, mon-keigh. Did you think after all the Paths I have had the good fortune to walk in my life, I would be intimidated by the words of so worthless a creature?"

traits.locale_text: "Tehditlerin gülünesi bir hâlde mon-keigh. Hayatım boyunca yürüme şansına eriştiğim tüm o Yollardan sonra bu denli değersiz bir yaratığın sözleriyle gözümün korkacağını mı sandın?"
